name: APF Nanos
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Kyr'ozch Circutry" "275914" - Sector 28 #L "Crystalline Matrix" "275912" - Sector 28 #L "Odd Kyr'ozch Nanobots" "275906" - Sector 35 #L "Kyr'ozch Processing Unit" "275907" - Sector 35 #L "Gelatinous Lump" "275909" - Sector 13 #L "Biotech Matrix" "275916" - Sector 13 #L "Screwdriver" "150922" and either: #L "Alpha Program Chip" "275918" - Sector 35 or #L "Beta Program Chip" "275919" - Sector 35 ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Kyr'ozch Circutry + Screwdriver = #L "Disassembled Kyr'ozch Circutry" "275915" Skills: | ME400 | ------------------------------ Odd Kyr'ozch Nanobots + Kyr'ozch Processing Unit = #L "Nanite Recompiler" "275908" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Gelatinous Lump + Nanite Recompiler = #L "Nanite-Infused Gel" "275910" Skills: | CH 400 | ------------------------------ Nanite-Infused Gel + Crystalline Matrix = #L "Nanite-Infused Gelatinous Cube" "275913" Skills: | CH 400 | ------------------------------ Biotech Matrix + Disassembled Kyr'ozch Circutry = #L "Kyr'ozch Matrix" "275917" Skills: | PT 400 | ------------------------------ You then have to combine whichever Program Chip you have, the result is NODROP and UNIQUE either: Kyr'ozch Matrix + Alpha Program Chip = #L "Inert Kyr'ozch Alpha Matrix" "275920" Skills: | EE 400 | or Kyr'ozch Matrix + Beta Program Chip = #L "Inert Kyr'ozch Beta Matrix" "275921" Skills: | EE 400 | ------------------------------ The final step is to combine your Inert Alpha or Beta Matrix with Nanite-Infused Gelatinous Cube. Depending on which Inert Kyr'orch Matrix you have combined with it, will determine your outcome: either: Inert Kyr'ozch Alpha Matrix + Nanite-Infused Gelatinous Cube = #L "Alien Matrix Alpha Box" "275706" Skills: | QT 400 | or: Inert Kyr'ozch Beta Matrix + Nanite-Infused Gelatinous Cube = #L "Alien Matrix Beta Box" "275854" Skills: | QT 400 | ------------------------------ The boxes will give you the following nanos for your profession (unfortunately I cant give you an internal game link but I have provided links to each nano on auno): ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ NOTE: The following links are links to auno.org: Adventurer (Alpha) #L "Mother Wolf" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275817" (Beta) #L "Improved Stare of Cerberus" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275821" Agent (Alpha) #L "Way of The Executioner" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275822" (Beta) #L "Bullseye" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275823" Bureaucrat (Alpha) #L "Malaise of Zeal" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275824" (Beta) #L "Demotivational Speech: Dead Man Walking" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275826" Doctor (Alpha) #L "Malpractice" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275701" (Beta) #L "Nanite Instinctive Control" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275829" Enforcer (Alpha) #L "Hellish Rage" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275830" (Beta) #L "Valiant Challenger to Behemoth" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275833" Engineer (Alpha) #L "Ravening M-60" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275815" (Beta) #L "Intrusive Aura of Slave" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275835" Fixer (Alpha) #L "Greater Preservation Matrix" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275679" (Beta) #L "Refactor NCU Matrix" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275680" Keeper (Alpha) #L "Imminence of Extermination" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275837" (Beta) #L "Giant of Swords" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275838" Martial Artist (Alpha) #L "Matrix of Ka" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275698" (Beta) #L "Form of Risan" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275700" Meta Physicist (Alpha) #L "Creation: Asp of Titaniush" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275849" (Alpha) #L "Creation: Shield of Esa" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275852" (Beta) #L "Touch of Poison" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275853" Nano Technician (Alpha) #L "Detonation Matrix" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275692" (Beta) #L "Optic Plague" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275697" Shade (Alpha) #L "Basic Nanite Depravation" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275841" (Beta) #L "Triple Wall" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275843" Soldier (Alpha) #L "Improved Precognition" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275844" (Beta) #L "Improved Ranged Energy Weapon Mastery" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275905" Trader (Alpha) #L "Unstoppable Killer" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=275846" (Beta) #L "Your Enemy's Enemy is your Friend" "/start http://auno.org/ao/db.php?id=270714" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ There are no actual nano crystals on the auno database, so having never done this quest myself I can only assume that you trade the cube and the new nano automatically uploads into your list.
